AUTOCOLORFOLDER.autocolorfolderHint: Colorize folders (level#1) with a single gradient color
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.selectColorModeHint: Three modes are available to colorize your folders for a better management
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.options.colorselector.sc: Define start color on scene directories for gradient
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.options.colorselector.ac: Define start color on actor directories for gradient
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.options.colorselector.it: Define start color on item directories for gradient
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.options.colorselector.jo: Define start color on journal directories for gradient
AUTOCOLORFOLDER.options.colorselector.co: Define start color on compendium directories for gradient
